hero.title: About OSP
hero.subtitle: 47 years transforming accounting into a strategic business instrument

essence.title: Our Essence
essence.paragraph1: OSP was founded in 1977 with a clear vision: to be more than an accounting firm. From the beginning, we positioned ourselves as the technical and advisory arm of companies seeking excellence in tax and financial management.
essence.paragraph2: Today, we are a national reference in serving companies under the Real Profit regime, combining tradition with innovation to deliver results that transform businesses.

hero.title: OSP360
hero.subtitle: Complete strategic diagnostic in 45 days to transform your company's management

what.title: What is OSP360?
what.description: It's our proprietary business diagnostic methodology that analyzes all tax, financial, and operational aspects of your company in 45 days, generating a strategic action plan to maximize results.

features.title: Deep Analysis
features.description: Complete review of tax documents, contracts, and processes

features.title: Gap Identification
features.description: Mapping of risks, inefficiencies, and opportunities

features.title: Strategic Plan
features.description: Detailed roadmap with prioritization and timeline

features.title: Follow-up
features.description: Support in implementing recommendations

benefits.title: OSP360 Benefits
items: Complete 360° view of tax and financial health
Identification of tax risks and savings opportunities
Structured action plan for the next 12 months
Feasibility analysis for migration to Real Profit regime

midCTA.title: Is your company ready to grow?
midCTA.description: In just 45 days, you'll have a complete roadmap to maximize your results. The OSP360 diagnostic is free and without commitment.

steps.title: Kick-off and Collection (Days 1-10)
steps.description: Initial meeting, scope definition, and collection of tax, accounting, and operational documentation

steps.title: Analysis and Diagnosis (Days 11-30)
steps.description: Tax, financial, and operational analysis with identification of risks and opportunities

steps.title: Action Plan (Days 31-45)
steps.description: Executive presentation with prioritized roadmap and implementation timeline

cta.title: Ready to transform your management?
cta.description: Request an OSP360 diagnostic and discover how we can help your company

hero.title: HOLDING360
hero.subtitle: Asset structuring, asset protection, and succession planning for family groups

what.title: Protect and organize your assets
what.description: Creation of asset and business holdings, succession planning, asset protection, and family governance with complete legal and tax security.

features.title: Asset Holding
features.description: Structuring of real estate and assets for protection

features.title: Asset Protection
features.description: Asset shielding and risk segregation

features.title: Succession Planning
features.description: Structured family succession without conflicts

features.title: Governance
features.description: Shareholders agreement and family rules

urgency.title: Why structure your holding in 2025?
urgency.subtitle: Three factors converge to make 2025 the decisive year for those with assets above R$ 5 million

factors.title: PL 1.087/2025 - Dividend Taxation
factors.description: Dividends will be progressively taxed (0-15%). Structuring before 2026 allows the use of accumulated profits without income tax.

factors.title: State ITCMD Increases
factors.description: States like SP may increase ITCMD from 4% to 8%. Donations via holding today avoid future higher rates.

factors.title: Tax Reform in Effect
factors.description: CBS/IBS change rental taxation. Holdings structured in 2025 have an advantage in the new regime.

deadline.title: Window of opportunity: until 12/31/2025
deadline.description: Holdings structured by December 2025 take advantage of current rules before dividend taxation and possible ITCMD increases.

benefits.title: Benefits of Asset Holding
items: Reduction of ITCMD (Inheritance Tax) by up to 4-8%
Protection against seizures and business risks
Organization of family succession without conflicts
Income tax savings on rentals (Real Profit in holding)

cta.title: Structure your holding safely
cta.description: Schedule a consultation with our specialists in asset planning
